entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as leaving the room and being suspected of hoping for a glimpse of Dudley.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's bedroom is known to George and Harry has heard a lot about Dudley from him.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is suspected of hoping for a glimpse of Dudley along with George.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as being talked about by Harry and hoped to be seen by Fred and George.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley tries to break the silence with a compliment on the Dursleys' place.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon's face turns purple in anger at Mr. Weasley's comment.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia starts chewing her tongue again in response to Mr. Weasley's comment.

relationships.description: George and Harry know where each other's bedrooms are.
Fred wants to see Dudley, as he has heard a lot about him from Harry.
George also wants to see Dudley, along with Fred.
Mr. Weasley compliments Uncle Vernon's place, which doesn't go down well with him.
Mr. Weasley also compliments Aunt Petunia's place, but she is too scared to respond.
